name: Outpost 77
description:
The Outpost must survive at all costs. The alien invaders must not touch the surface!

Create Factories and Generators to produce Parts and Energy, respectively. These resources can be used to create even more structures, including Guns!

The Score is calculated based on resource generation and enemy destruction.

Music and SFX are sourced from pixabay.com: Lone Wolf by GuilhermeBernardes, Open the can by Saviraz, Fire Magic by qubodup.

The font is downloaded from Google Fonts: Space Mono.

Software used: Unity,  VS Code, Aseprite etc.

Note: The scoring system has a bug. Please Exit and Re-open the game to reset the score counter. Also, the score on the Game Over menu is incorrect. The correct score is shown in the bottom panel.
